scripts.test: lab --ignore lambdaContainerId -r console -o stdout -r html -o build/report/coverage.html -r lcov -o build/report/lcov.info
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm test && npm run lint && npm pack && tar -C build/tmp/ -xvzf wasserstandinfo-prefetch-*.tgz && pushd build/tmp/package && npm i --production && zip -r -1 ../../lambda.zip * && popd
scripts.invoke.remote: aws lambda invoke --function-name WasserstandInfoPrefetch --region eu-central-1 out.json
scripts.cf.deploy.DEV.resource: npm run cf.package.resource && aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ./build/sam-resource-deploy.yaml --stack-name wasserstandinfo-prefetch-resources-dev
scripts.cf.deploy.PROD.resource: npm run cf.package.resource && aws cloudformation deploy --parameter-overrides Stage=PROD,UploadBucketName=dschmitz.wasserstandsinfo --template-file ./build/sam-resource-deploy.yaml --stack-name wasserstandinfo-prefetch-resources-prod
scripts.cf.package.lambda: npm run package && aws cloudformation package --template-file sam.yaml --s3-bucket dschmitz.cloudformation.test --output-template-file ./build/sam-deploy.yaml
scripts.cf.deploy.PROD.lambda: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ./build/sam-deploy.yaml --stack-name wasserstandinfo-prefetch-prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides Stage=PROD UploadBucketName=dschmitz.wasserstandsinfo
